channel.title: Now that my head is spinning
channel.description: One question or 100 I am still gunna sound so n00b it will probably hurt peoples eyes to read it. BUT, here is goes anyway. How to I get into a server ?? I am sure I downloaded whatever the forums told me to download.. Read through quite a few posts and just don't see what I am doing wrong. I tried logging into that 127.0.0.1 and it just tells me the server is down. Is it really down ? Or am I doing something wrong ? I don't know anything about whatever a port does, why I need to change it, how to change it and why I would need to change it just to get into someones server ? Can anyone explain to me in LAMEmans terms what I am doing wrong and how to fix it ? :eek: :confused: Seriously, I really did have to google most of the questions just to get into the forums.

item.title: Now that my head is spinning
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

127.0.0.1 means localhost, ur own computer.

Read full topic
item.source: Now that my head is spinning

well, it asked the server ip and thats what came up, I didnt actually PUT it there… and really, you arent helpful so move along.
